name: Nuke America?
description:
The year is 1978, the height of the Cold War. You're, a russian missle silo manager who has recieved a message from Moscow to send nuclear war heads to America. You have but only 40 seconds to decide! Will you send the warheads or will you save the world?

Made in  GDevelop

Sound Effects:
